messages.message: how many cores do you need @vineeth

and can you pick GPU from here?
https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/gpus

Cores - 4 minimum
GPU - P4 (because only P4 has the 8GB option)
RAM - 24 GB

okay this costs $714 per month. Making sure you have approvals on this (@Balaram?) :slightly_smiling_face:

we have not had formal mechanisms to approve such requests earlier - I will discuss internally on standardising this.
(ofc billing is per second from GCP, so you can tear it down once you are done and will be billed for the duration until teardown)

@sudeep We donâ€™t need GPU for a month, maximum for 2 days. Pls give me a day to close on this.

@vineeth Pls add your thoughts
We have to iterate over 400k docs, will have a clear idea on training time after a day of run

@Balaram I can create this whenever you want to get started. Once you are done - you will have perms to go in and delete this VM. You will only be billed from creation time, to when you terminate the VM.
Let me know when you need this VM to be created; and once you are done you can go ahead and terminate it.
Sure Sudeep will ping tomo when I have everything ready
